summary: On a college ski weekend, Todd and Craig pretend to be Jane and Nora, a pair of English girls. Their reasons? To meet girls, and to learn to ski. Along the way, Lesley Gore shows up on the ... See full summary »
cast: Frankie Avalon|Dwayne Hickman|Deborah Walley|Yvonne Craig|Robert Q. Lewis|Bobbie Shaw Chance|Aron Kincaid|The Hondells|Steven Rogers|Patti Chandler|Michael Nader|Salli Sachse|John Boyer|Mikki Jamison|Mickey Dora|Mary Hughes|Bill Sampson|Luree Holmes|James Brown|The Famous Flames|Lesley Gore|Jo Collins|Semi Engl|Annette Funicello|Ed Garner|Paul Gleason|Dick Miller|Nan Morris|Christopher Riordan|Astrid Schultz
title: Chicos con faldas, chicas con esquíes
